description:
Jake Porter is just kicking it on campus preparing for a test when old buddy Carter Woods happens upon him. Jake has had a crush on Carter for as long as he can remember, but alas, Carter is straight and has a girlfriend. But today is Jake's lucky day: Carter's girlfriend is out of town and it seems that Carter has been harboring a crush of his own for Jake. Jake really should study but who can think about school when Carter is begging with his eyes to make Jake's fantasy come true. A good education is invaluable, but a good fuck is worth its weight in gold.

Enjoy!
title: Fuck Study
